flawed_nl_solution:
Ned has gone up 165 / 11 = <<165/11=15>>15 flights of stairs.
Thus, he has 20 - 15 = <<20-15=3>>3 flights of stairs left to run up.
He will spend 3 * 11 = <<3*11=33>>33 seconds running up the remaining stairs to the bomb.
Therefore, he will have 72 - 33 = <<72-33=39>>39 seconds to defuse the bomb.
#### 39

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5, not 3. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
